get_grid

Source: R/vision_data.R
get_grid.Rd

Return a grid of `n` axes, `rows` by `cols`

get_grid(
  n,
  nrows = NULL,
  ncols = NULL,
  add_vert = 0,
  figsize = NULL,
  double = FALSE,
  title = NULL,
  return_fig = FALSE,
  imsize = 3
)
